alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued December 19 at 10:29AM EST until December 19 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor saltwater flooding. Observations indicate water levels are subsiding, but for the short term a statement is still warranted. * WHERE...Upper Florida Keys. * WHEN...Through late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is likely. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
